sentences.en: An old bird is not to be caught with chaff.
He wouldn't even feed his pigs with them. His pigs get rice mixed with chaff.
sentences.cn: 除非拿去喂猪!就是喂猪, 他也不会要的,人家喂猪,全是糠拌饭!

sentences.en: It isn't always easy to separate the wheat from the chaff.
sentences.cn: 分清良莠并不总是很容易。

sentences.en: Make them like tumbleweed , O my God, like chaff before the wind.
sentences.cn: 我的神阿,求你叫他们像旋风的尘土, 像风前的碎秸.

sentences.en: Old birds are not to be caught with chaff.
sentences.cn: 有经验的人不易受骗上当.

sentences.en: Pieces of chaff or straw that fall from hay.
sentences.cn: 干草屑从干草中撒落出来的草屑或麦秸.

sentences.en: She faced death calmly and unflinchingly before the enemy's chaff - cutter .
sentences.cn: 她在敌人 铡刀 前,视死如归,毫无惧色.

sentences.en: She stood there winnowing chaff all day in the field.
sentences.cn: 她一整天站在地里筛糠.

sentences.en: Sift out the wheat from the chaff.
The girl is winnowing the chaff from the corn.
sentences.cn: 那个女孩正在簸去谷壳.

sentences.en: The neighbors'suspicions were chaff of the lowest sort based on gossip.
sentences.cn: 邻居们因流言蜚语而产生怀疑,这是最无聊不过的事了.

sentences.en: They are sifting the wheat from the chaff.
Tu - Chu - chaff stuck out his tongue, withdrew it, and grinned.
sentences.cn: 杜竹斋 把舌头一伸, 嘻嘻地笑了.

sentences.en: Will You harass a driven leaf And pursue dry chaff?
sentences.cn: 25你要惊动被风吹的叶子,追赶枯干的碎秸 么 ?

words.tran_cn: 无用的，空洞的；粗糠多的；谷皮子状的

phrases.phrase: separate (或 sort) the wheat from the chaff

trans.tran_cn: 谷壳，逗弄，切碎的干草或稻草，无价值的东西
trans.tran_en: the outer seed covers that are separated from grain before it is used as food
